attributes.action: To ensure Fathers Issues are not just listened too, but resolved in a non discriminatory manner. We also petition the Prime Minister to provide funding to build a refuge in EVERY major city, for men and their children who are victims of Domestic Violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not want talk. We want action. The government MUST resolve our issues fairly an in a non discrminating manner. Men are victims of Domestic Violence, but have no where to go. The government MUST supply funding to enable the opening of Male Victims of Domestic Violence refuges, in every major city, so male sufferers can go there to escape this violence, with their children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
